definitions.definition: Of or pertaining to an economic theory based on the ideas of John Maynard Keynes , as put forward in his book The General Theory of Employment, Interest and Money , published in 1936 in response to the Great Depression of the 1930s, and extensively extended by a large body of followers before and after his death in 1946.

main_definition: ( economics ) Of or pertaining to an economic theory based on the ideas of John Maynard Keynes , as put forward in his book The General Theory of Employment, Interest and Money , published in 1936 in response to the Great Depression of the 1930s, and extensively extended by a large body of followers before and after his death in 1946.
